item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, May 6, 2025 at 6:25 AM UTC
item.description:
1. "Sneakers" film released in 4k, struck from original camera negative (5 points | discuss)
2. The Curse of Knowing How, or; Fixing Everything (5 points | discuss)
3. Faster sorting with SIMD CUDA intrinsics (2024) (32 points | 2 comments)
4. Evolving OpenAI's Structure (483 points | 516 comments)
5. Show HN: Real-time AI Voice Chat at ~500ms Latency (323 points | 132 comments)
6. Why does Switzerland have so many bunkers? (32 points | 16 comments)
7. Critical CSS (43 points | 15 comments)
8. Replacing Kubernetes with systemd (2024) (237 points | 123 comments)
9. Analyzing Modern Nvidia GPU Cores (104 points | 6 comments)
10. “An independent journalist” who won't remain nameless (169 points | 59 comments)
11. Understanding Memory Management, Part 5: Fighting with Rust (49 points | 5 comments)
12. Possibly a Serious Possibility (204 points | 91 comments)
13. Technical analysis of the Signal clone used by Trump officials (623 points | 262 comments)
14. Databricks in talks to acquire startup Neon for about $1B (144 points | 95 comments)
15. Google has most of my email because it has all of yours (2014) (134 points | 85 comments)
16. Show HN: VectorVFS, your filesystem as a vector database (233 points | 109 comments)
17. How Kim Jong Il Kidnapped a Director, Made a Cult Hit Godzilla Knockoff (2015) (57 points | 18 comments)
18. How are cyber criminals rolling in 2025? (210 points | 71 comments)
19. Catastrophic fires and soil degradation: possible link with Neolithic revolution (5 points | discuss)
20. Show HN: TextQuery – Query CSV, JSON, XLSX Files with SQL (135 points | 50 comments)
21. I decided to pay off a school’s lunch debt (311 points | 338 comments)
22. Open WebUI changed license from BSD-3 to Open WebUI license with CLA (42 points | 35 comments)
23. As an experienced LLM user, I don't use generative LLMs often (294 points | 157 comments)
24. The Beauty of Having a Pi-Hole (2024) (224 points | 155 comments)
25. The vocal effects of Daft Punk (391 points | 99 comments)
26. Dimension 126 Contains Twisted Shapes, Mathematicians Prove (115 points | 64 comments)
27. Show HN: Tkintergalactic - Declarative Tcl/Tk UI Library for Python (74 points | 8 comments)
28. The Death of Daydreaming (581 points | 223 comments)
29. Kate and Python Language Server (66 points | 11 comments)
30. Show HN: I built a 7-day calendar app – no months or years, just the next 7 days (19 points | 13 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, May 6, 2025 at 6:25 AM UTC
